评论概述: A bit large - but I'm a small guy
评论详情: I'm a pretty small dude - 5'4", 120lb - so I knew it would be a bit large when I got it. I wanted an extra layer for the upcoming Fall season and a solid lounge shirt, and I think it'll work great! I do agree with the other reviews that it's a bit on the thinner side, and will be a little see-through/obvious when stretched.  I'd say you get what ya pay for when buying a cheaper turtleneck like this, but overall it's a solid layer. I wouldn't recommend wearing this shirt alone!

Color is not as bright as photo which is good, it's a nicer shade of blue. Slim fit which looks good on my husband because he is thin, 5'10", 150 pounds. The material is not too thin but it is unforgiving if you have any bulges. The sleeves are a bit short on him but he has long arms. It's a smooth knit and the cuffs and waist band are a nice slightly ribbed contrast.

评论概述: Knitted, Very Long Length, Semi-long Sleeves
评论详情: I'm female, 5'9" and 116 pounds with long arms, so I often check the men's section for basics that can work as unisex items. I took 3 images, in different light so you can see a bit of the Wine Rd color and the fit. One image is kitchen floor, one is bathroom light and the closeup is outdoors. (Of course, cameras also adjust a bit for different lighting)  It fits me loose in the chest, which is to expected for a Men's Small. The sleeves are "just perfect" and the length is a bit long on me. The length is also long in the listing images, so I think it is supposed to fit long. I thought the sleeves would be a spec longer - relatively speaking. So if you're a man, and have super long arms, the sleeves might actually be short for your comfort.  I like that the color is a deep dark red. You can see that it shifts in the light. The material is a knit and has a spec of weight to it. The neck, which you roll is plenty long. I might even triple the roll. Happy with it and I'll put it to some good use as cold weather approaches.

This sweater is beautiful and I love the navy blue color too! The overall quality is great and there was no defect. I normally wear size Medium in standard fitting but I upsized it because it's a slim fit and I have a built/broader body. It's still a bit too fitted and I think an XL would've been more comfortable as I like to keep my clothes not hugging so much. But I can easily stretch it and it should work fine. It's not a really thick sweater, so you'll definitely have to wear a button down shirt or something else underneath it. However, if you live in a state where winter is mild, you can just wear the sweater with a t-shirt and won't be too cold (depending on the temperature). Overall, very happy to have it in my closet and definitely recommend it. Just consider upsizing appropriately.
Very soft and stretchy sweater. It fits my husband perfectly and normal sizing works.

I got this for my husband who is 6"2 and 240lbs. The shirt was very long on his torso and tight on the chest and torse. The color is a rich dark color and material is.lighrweight. I would recommend sizing up 2 sizes. My husband usually wears a large and XL was still too small

评论概述: Great to use as a base layer…
评论详情: This turtleneck fits as expected. I like the shirt because the material is on the thinner side, as I planned to use it as a base layer only. However, if you want to wear it as your main shirt, you should probably consider another shirt.
Fits like a glove, meaning it is not a loose fit. Comfortable and stretchy, it adjusts to your contours. Material is ribbed and warm.

This is a really comfortable turtleneck sweater! Its so comfortable I have been wearing it as a shirt. The knitted material feels really good! It is a really good looking and stylish sweater. It fits well and lays well. The turtleneck is just right, on point and is very comfortable. Pairing this with a dress shirt and you have a classic winning look. I have 2 Coofandy shirts already so I was excited to get this sweater. One of those shirts is 2 years old and still looks great. I expect this sweater too last too.

It's a stylish, well-made turtleneck sweater.  The fabric is thin and keeps you warm without being overbearing; although the sweater sits a little loose, it's still very comfortable.  Overall, it's a great sweater that delivers both style and comfort.

My title says it all. I knew it was going to be a little snug for my fit. I know it's a slim fit design but I'd rather have something that has a little more give to it when bending your elbows or bending down to fix your shoe laces. It does feel comfortable to the touch. It's not that see-through type of mesh material but enough to be a good undershirt if you have a coat or you just want to add to your style like The Rock sporting a fanny pack. Other than that, the stitching is perfect and it keeps you semi-warm  if you're really wearing it as a sweater.

评论概述: Decent fit, Pure white color, Poor quality fabric
评论详情: This is one slim fit turtle neck sweater of medium thickness knitted fabric. The fit is as advertised, slim and to size according to the provided chart (Most likely Asian import sizing, as I typically wear a Small and had to get a Medium).  Shrinkage may occur depending how you wash it. I recommend a cold gentle cycle and hang dry if you choose to keep this.  Unfortunately, I don't recommend this garment overall as it seems to fall apart, pill and fray much easier than I would hope. Before and after washing, I could tell that the fabric could have been much better. It seems to come apart just by rubbing it between your fingers. I expect a little bit of this from a knitted fabric, but this was to the point I didn't think the fabric would last long at all.  Probably good for one to a few days of use but I wouldn't expect to keep it in your wardrobe very long. Not recommended.

评论概述: Material is too thin for me
评论详情: I like how it looked on the mannequin but in reality the material was flimsy to say at best. The only part that felt like quality was the turtleneck area. Other than that it felt cheap and too thin for my liking. I wore a medium and it did feel a little tighter than usual. I think it’d look best on with a grey undershirt. I wouldn’t recommend this to a friend.

I don't dislike this turtleneck, but I don't like it either.  The fit is fine, for a medium, it fits just as how I expected it to.  My issue is that the material is pretty thin, and so I can tell where it is stretching as I wear it.  If I even once snag it on something also, I am afraid it will ruin that part of the shirt.  So, wearing it on it's own is out of the question, but luckily, I did plan on layering it with my flannels come fall and winter.

First impression: This turtleneck sweater feels soft to the touch.  I ordered a size small and the fit is just as I expected.  The material is thick enough to keep you warm, but light and not bulky. The maroon color I picked (see photo) would go well with blue jeans.

Good, straightforward turtleneck.  If selecting the black version, would be good for a Steve Jobs impersonation at Halloween.  Comfortable and fits well (it is slim fitting), but I find the shoulder width just a tad large.  I don’t have narrow shoulder by any means, but the seam hangs slightly over the upper arm.  Not a biggie and I doubt anyone will notice.  But there it is.  Your fitting may vary and I do recommend this.
Fits true to size!

This is truly the ideal turtleneck sweater: it's stretchy and comfortable, it's thin enough to wear in warm weather, yet thick enough to wear in cool weather. I'm 5-foot-10, average build, and I usually wear size large, which is what I ordered. As you can see from my posted photo, the fit is perfect. I washed the turtleneck before trying it on so I would know if it shrunk in the dryer. It did not.  Priced at $25, this is a bargain. The style is suitable for almost any occasion, from casual to dressy. These sweaters are made in China, and the fabric is Viscose, which is made from trees.  I wasn't familiar with Viscose, so I Google-search the fabric, and here's a few notes to know: "Viscose fabric looks luxurious, but it isn't expensive. Its soft feel and silk-like sheen make viscose rayon popular. However, there are certain disadvantages to this fabric, making it difficult to care for. Viscose rayon is very breathable, making it a cool fabric for stylish summer wear ... It also gets wrinkled easily. When exposed to heat and light, the fabrics fade and deteriorate. It is prone to mildew, and when wet, the fibers become weak. The viscose fabric needs to be dry-cleaned in most cases."  I did not dry-clean my sweater, it seems to be holding up just fine, and it hasn't wrinkled.

The turtleneck is very soft and feels like a quality garment, not scratchy at all. The neck area is nice and snug but not to tight. The color is nice and does not feel washed out. Nice stitching so no running threads!! My only issue is the underarm areas, it feels and looks puffy. Wear it under a sports coat and it looks amazing, by itself not so much.

评论概述: Super nice quality and fits great!
评论详情: I love the way this shirt looks - it fits true to size, it's super soft and comfortable, and it looks very elegant and classy. It's a beautiful shade of red, too. The material is a little heavier than a cotton turtleneck since it's knitted but that really makes for a nice, upscale look.  Overall I am very pleased with it and would recommend it. Will definitely be ordering more in other colors!
